Text.Page:
Elleon and I, along with our colleagues, have put weeks of work into exposing Atel Akaad's plot.
Today, we finally see the fruits of our efforts.
(Select Cultists' Refuge (Solo) to advance Dark Dreams Sundered.)
The teleportal is ready for use. We can go when you're ready.<TEXTBUTTON>Use teleportal.</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>Teleport to Cultists' Refuge</EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
